casebody.data:
No. 1361,

Misc.

Georgia v. Tuttle, Chief Judge, U. S. Court of Appeals, et al. Eugene Cook, Attorney General of Georgia, Albert Sidney Johnson, Assistant Attorney General, and J. Robert Sparks for petitioner. Donald L. Hollowell and Jack Greenberg for Rachel et al., respondents. William M. Kunstler, Arthur Kinoy, Nils R. Douglas, Robert F. Collins, Carl Rachlin, Floyd B. McKissick and Michael J. Kunstler for Congress of Racial Equality, Inc., et al., as amici curiae, in opposition.

Motion of Congress of Racial Equality, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief, as amici curiae, granted. Motion for leave to file petition for writ of prohibition and/or mandamus denied.
